en-US.name: ThinkRank: AI Research Games
en-US.subtitle: Contribute to AI safety through engaging research games
en-US.description:
Join the fight for AI safety through engaging, gamified research experiences.

ThinkRank transforms complex AI alignment and bias detection challenges into accessible, entertaining games that make real contributions to artificial intelligence safety research.

üî¨ SCIENTIFIC RIGOR

üí° EDUCATIONAL VALUE

Whether you're an AI researcher, student, or simply curious about artificial intelligence, ThinkRank offers an engaging way to contribute to one of the most important challenges of our time.

Download now and start making a difference in AI safety research!

appReviewInformation.notes:
ThinkRank is a research-focused gaming platform that contributes to AI safety research. The app includes:

1. Educational games based on real AI research problems
2. Social features for collaborative research
3. Subscription model for premium features
4. All research contributions are reviewed by experts
5. No user-generated content that requires moderation
6. Appropriate for ages 13+ due to complex subject matter

Demo account provides access to all features. The app requires internet connection for research data synchronization.
